segments.text: What are your strengths and weaknesses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As I said , I am diligent and industrious . On the other hand , I am too hard-working and I put myself under much pressure to make things perfect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is your problem in working ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am too introverted to let others become my friends .
segments.speaker: S2
